title: What is the history of old and modern computers? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are far too many books on the subject to even attempt to capture in a Quora response. There was at least one book written on the pivotal decision whether to produce 386's. Computer history doesn't go as far back as Adam but it does go farther back than Ada. Charles Babbage is credited with designing the first digitally-programmable computer in the early 1800s, but there were analog computers before then - most notably the Antikythera Mechanism dated circa 100 B.C.
